company.name: rebuy
company.description:
rebuy’s mission is to provide a conscious, low-cost alternative to new products, without compromising in looks or functionality. We developed a unique refurbishing process that upgrades pre-owned products & increases their value. 

The journey started with university students, a small shelf full of video games & a big vision. Since then, rebuy has grown into a 10.000 m² warehouse and logistic center, has more than 550 employees and has had 5 million customers, making rebuy the lead player in Europe.
